COVID19 Widget Pakistan
 The data updates every 15 minutes, if you unsure how to add widget follow the following steps:
 1. Goto your home screen.
 2. Hold and tap it until you see the add Widget button.
 3. Click it and find covid19 widget add it.
 4. there we go.
 If you're using (Xiaomi, Redmi, Letv, Oppo, Asus...) then goto Settings -> Apps -> Covid19 Pakistan Widget Turn on Autostart. then add widget.
